Class DonutController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4_213.DonutController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DonutController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
DonutController implements the methods to control the donutView
Author:
Yuvaraaj Murthy, Bharg Trivedi
